trans-unit.source: Iterates over all following nodes according to the XPath following axis rules.

<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> iterates over all following nodes according to XPath following axis rules, merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order, and removes duplicates.
<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order and removes duplicates.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on name.

The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property changes when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property to the next node and returns <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode>; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
Moves the iterator to the next following node.
Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NoMoreNodes"></xref> if there are no more following nodes.
Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NeedInputNode"></xref> if the next input node must be fetched first.

Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current"></xref> property was set to the next node while iterating through the nodes.
